name: Simon's Cat
summary:
西蒙的猫是西蒙养的一只“坏”猫。西蒙被他折磨的够戗。为此西蒙作为一个著名的导演，创作了关于猫的漫画和动画短片。 　　
    英国导演西蒙·特菲尔德（Simon Tofield）的系列短片《西蒙的猫》（Simon’s Cat）去年在YouTube播出后，以2.5亿的点击量迅速风靡全球，获得2008年度英国动画奖颁发的“最佳喜剧奖”，也让大众记住了这只继加菲猫之后又一只喜欢恶作剧的猫咪形象。 　　
    根据该片改编的绘本《西蒙的猫》由现代出版社推出，该书没有任何文字，以黑白颜色和简单线条，给读者呈现了一个与短片的特效视觉完全不同的想象空间。西蒙·特菲尔德颠覆了传统中猫咪乖巧、温顺的形象，在这本书里读者看到的是一只机灵、捣蛋，经常令主人狼狈不堪的“坏”猫咪。作者借猫与人的喜怒哀乐，表达了对自由和幽默的感悟：在我们每个人的内心都有这样一只猫咪，它的恶搞不是目的，得到更多的爱和关怀才是最终追求。
info:
• 中文名: 西蒙的猫
  • 话数: *
  • 放送开始: 2008-03-04
  • 别名: 西蒙和他的猫
  • 别名: 西蒙的淘氣貓
  • 官方网站: https://simonscat.com/

eps.name: Cat Man Do
eps.desc: Cat goes to extreme measures to get Simon out of bed in the morning so he can fix Cat his breakfast. "Cat Man Do" won the "Best Comedy" award at the British Animation Awards 2008.

eps.name: Off to the Vet
eps.desc: After an unfortunate encounter in the garden, Simon’s Cat goes to great lengths to avoid an imminent visit to the vet. As always, the question remains - will his long-suffering owner Simon step up to the challenge?

eps.name: Let Me In!
eps.desc: Cat goes to great lengths to get through the glass rear door until Simon comes to let him in.

eps.name: TV Dinner
eps.desc: Cat just won't leave his master alone for a second as he attempts to watch television.The episode was shown on BBC2's The Culture Show on 15 July 2008 before being released on YouTube.

eps.name: Fed Up!
eps.desc: Originally made for the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals's 2008 "Give Animals A Voice" campaign under the title "Simon's Sister's Dog in: Fed Up!" which did not feature the cat: a lesson in over-consumption goes to an eagerly overeating dog and the family as they drop scraps to eat at the dinner table.

eps.name: Fly Guy
eps.desc: A game of Cat and Fly has undesired results for Simon.

eps.name: Hot Spot
eps.desc: Cat has to find a way to get under the warm glow of his master's drawing lamp. It was released shortly before its book's release.

eps.name: Snow Business
eps.desc: A day of play turns cold when Cat discovers that it is snowing. It is the first appearance of the bird.

eps.name: The Box
eps.desc: Leaving an empty box unattended around Cat will produce undesired results.

eps.name: Cat Chat
eps.desc: The last thing this hedgehog wants for a gabbing partner is a cat with a short attention span. First animated appearance of the hedgehog character.

eps.name: Lunch Break
eps.desc: Cat's clever move of pulling the tablecloth out from underneath the dishes could use a little work.

eps.name: Santa Claws
eps.desc: Cat's Christmas gives him new trees to climb and new ornaments to paw at. First episode to include theme music at beginning and end.

eps.name: Sticky Tape
eps.desc: Cat meets a new, transparent adversary.

eps.name: Hop It
eps.desc: Cat tries to "Easter" into a new routine.

eps.name: Hidden Treasure
eps.desc: A game of catch the ball turns into a treasure hunt when Cat's ball hides itself in the gaping darkness beneath the refrigerator.

eps.name: Cat & Mouse
eps.desc: Cat messes around with the computer mouse.

eps.name: Double Trouble
eps.desc: Cat gets a new hungry flatmate. First appearance of the kitten.

eps.name: Catnap
eps.desc: The kitten nuzzles in on a sleeping Cat.

eps.name: Fowl Play
eps.desc: Cat has plans for Christmas dinner.

eps.name: Shelf Life
eps.desc: The cat causes mischief when walking along a shelf.

eps.name: Tongue Tied
eps.desc: The cat meets a toad.

eps.name: Window Pain
eps.desc: Cat and kitten thwart Simon's attempts to clean a window.

eps.name: Ready, Steady, Slow!
eps.desc: The cat and friends cheer on a snail race.

eps.name: Springtime
eps.desc: The cat scales to new heights in search of supper.

eps.name: Fetch
eps.desc: The cat plays a disastrous game of fetch with an eager dog.

eps.name: Nut Again
eps.desc: The cat is tormented by a playful but malicious squirrel.

eps.name: Icecapade
eps.desc: The cat tries to catch a fish trapped under a frozen pond, only to be thwarted by the kitten.

eps.name: Feed Me
eps.desc: Cat can't wait to be fed.

eps.name: Screen Grab
eps.desc: Cat, kitten, and a flatscreen TV. It was later remade on 19 October 2017 with animated clips of Ellen to commemorate the launch of the show's 8th Annual Cat Week.

eps.name: Flower Bed
eps.desc: The cat waits impatiently to be fed while Simon plants a flower garden.

eps.name: Suitcase
eps.desc: The cat packs Simon's suitcase.

eps.name: Mirror Mirror
eps.desc: Cat sees his own reflection in a mirror on a door.

eps.name: Scary Legs
eps.desc: Cat tries to kill a spider, which Simon is afraid of, but the spider doesn't die. Halloween Special episode.

eps.name: Christmas Presence (Part 1)
eps.desc: Cat finds a robotic singing Santa Claus dummy.

eps.name: Christmas Presence (Part 2)
eps.desc: The Santa Claus dummy is used by Cat to get Kitten out of Cat's bed.

eps.name: Smitten
eps.desc: Cat falls in love with another cat and decides to impress her.

eps.name: Crazy Time
eps.desc: Cat causes another mess in Simon's home, this time from a sudden frenzy.

eps.name: Pawtrait
eps.desc: Cat sabotages Simon's attempt to take a photo of the kitten.

eps.name: Hot Water
eps.desc: Cat causes a mess in the bathroom while Simon takes a shower.

eps.name: Washed Up
eps.desc: The Cat chases a spider into the laundry room, and then tries to take a nap, with disastrous results.

eps.name: Scaredy Cat
eps.desc: Cat manages to terrify Simon during Halloween.

eps.name: Let Me Out
eps.desc: The cat wants to be fed, but ruins his owner's morning while waiting for him to come out of the bathroom.

eps.name: Catnip
eps.desc: The cat has fun with a catnip toy. Christmas Special Episode.

eps.name: Butterflies
eps.desc: Simon's cat tries to impress the female cat by bringing her a box full of butterflies. Valentine's Special Episode.

eps.name: April Showers
eps.desc: Simon's cat tries to catch a bird in the lawn on a rainy day, but Kitten scares the bird away and locks the cat outside. April's Fools Day episode.

eps.name: Pizza Cat
eps.desc: The cat wants Simon's pizza.

eps.name: Box Clever
eps.desc: The cat does everything possible to avoid a visit to the vet.

eps.name: Pug Life
eps.desc: The cat has trouble eating around the cone of shame, and is annoyed by a friendly Pug.

eps.name: Snow Cat
eps.desc: A clever cat gets creative out in the cold. Festive Special Episode.

eps.name: Tough Love
eps.desc: A curious cat lands himself in big trouble when he meets another female cat. (Valentine's Day Special Episode)

eps.name: Fast Track
eps.desc: Simon plays slot cars, but the cat spoils the fun.

eps.name: Field Trip
eps.desc: The cat is let loose in the wild.

eps.name: Muddy Paws
eps.desc: Simon's cat tries to clean the kitten.

eps.name: Laser Toy
eps.desc: Simon plays with his cat, using a laser toy.

eps.name: Fish Tank
eps.desc: Simon's cat becomes rivals with a sneaky fish.

eps.name: Trash Cat
eps.desc: Simon's cat attempts to get a discarded roast chicken out of the trash.

eps.name: The Monster
eps.desc: Simon's cat is frightened by a vacuum cleaner.

eps.name: Bed Sheets
eps.desc: Simon attempts to make up his bed, but the cat and the kitten make it impossible.

eps.name: Little Box
eps.desc: Simon's cat discovers a small box that is trouble for him, but perfect for the kitten.

eps.name: Dinner Date: Starters
eps.desc: A culinary cat helps Simon unpack his groceries. - Valentine's day special part 1.

eps.name: Dinner Date: Main Course
eps.desc: Simon's Cat is at it again - spoiling tireless owner Simon's dinner plans. - Valentine's day special part 2.

eps.name: Dinner Date: Just Desserts
eps.desc: It's finally time for Simon to serve dinner to his date, but Simon's Cat seems to have other plans. - Valentine's day special part 3.

eps.name: Copy Cat
eps.desc: An inquisitive kitten learns "how to cat." Simon's Cat tries to fool the kitten in a game of Simon Says.

eps.name: Waiting Game
eps.desc: A curious cat perseveres through the elements.

eps.name: Bed Head
eps.desc: When poor Simon is under the weather, a concerned cat practices his bedside manner.

eps.name: Scratch Post
eps.desc: The claws come out in a case of sibling rivalry.

eps.name: Spider Cat
eps.desc: Simon's Cat finally gets into the attic, and gives Simon a spooky surprise while he's there. Halloween Special episode also includes "Scary Legs" and "Scaredy Cat" shorts.

eps.name: Hambush
eps.desc: Simon makes himself a ham sandwich, but Simon's Cat "ham-pers" his attempts. Episode includes "Trash Cat" and "Pizza Cat" shorts.

eps.name: D.I.Y.
eps.desc: A curious cat helps his owner with home improvements.

eps.name: Fast Food
eps.desc: Simon's cat and kitten join forces to gobble down a festive feast. (Thanksgiving special episode)

eps.name: Kitten Crazy Time
eps.desc: Simon's cat discovers Kitten has his own 'crazy time' too.

eps.name: Fireworks
eps.desc: An anxious cat tries to hide from the festive celebrations.

eps.name: Christmas Yarn
eps.desc: A playful cat leaves his owner out in the cold.

eps.name: Head Over Heels
eps.desc: In this Valentine's Day special, Simon's Cat has once again fallen in love with Chloe.

eps.name: Purrthday Cake
eps.desc: A loving owner treats his cat to a special birthday cake...full of cat food. This episode commemorates the show's and character's 10th anniversary.

eps.name: The Tree
eps.desc: Simon comes to his cat's rescue after discovering him up a tree meowing for help. This episode is based on a gag that Tofield drew for his book only to happen to him in real life.

eps.name: Polished Paws
eps.desc: Simon polishes and prepares his dining table, but Simon's Cat comes sliding on through.

eps.name: Stretched Out
eps.desc: Simon's cat takes his time stretching out, even when his master offers him food.

eps.name: Crow
eps.desc: A cawing Crow is determined to disturb Simon's Cat's peace and quiet.

eps.name: Armchair Fan
eps.desc: Simon's plan to watch the 2018 FIFA World Cup is ruined by his four legged armchair fan.

eps.name: The Snip
eps.desc: An unprepared cat learns what 'The Snip' means. This short serves as a PSA for viewers to spay and neuter their pets.

eps.name: Borderline
eps.desc: Simon's Cat goes paw to paw with a territorial challenger. This is the first part of the Jazz trilogy and the first appearance of Jazz.

eps.name: On The Fence
eps.desc: A relentless feline nemesis doesn't know when to give up. This is the second part of the Jazz trilogy.

eps.name: Showdown
eps.desc: Simon's Cat and the Kitten go paw to paw with Jazz in a final showdown. This is the third part of the Jazz trilogy.

eps.name: Spooked!
eps.desc: Simon's Cat is seriously spooked by something in his master's bedroom.

eps.name: Kitten vs. Snake
eps.desc: The Kitten confronts something "slithery"...and plush.

eps.name: Festive Feast
eps.desc: Simon's Cat bites off more than he can chew. (Thanksgiving special episode)

eps.name: Winter Games
eps.desc: A competitive cat tries his paw at some Winter Games. (Christmas special episode)

eps.name: Stair Case
eps.desc: A mischievous cat plays a dangerous game with Simon on the stairs.

eps.name: BLIND DATE
eps.desc: A romantic cat climbs to new heights in order to find a date.

eps.name: Bathtime (Missing Cat, Part 1 of 4)
eps.desc: A cute messy cat has an unpleasant bathtime experience.

eps.name: Hide and Seek (Missing Cat, Part 2 of 4)
eps.desc: A sulking cat plays a game of hide and seek with his cute cat crush, Chloe.

eps.name: Lost (Missing Cat, Part 3 of 4)
eps.desc: A lost cat scrambles for shelter as his owner searches everywhere for him.

eps.name: Found (Missing Cat, Part 4 of 4)
eps.desc: Simon makes an attempt to find his cat, who was struggling to find shelter from the rain and was getting hungry. All 4 parts were then re-released back-to-back as a full-colour film two months later.

eps.name: Sunny Spot
eps.desc: A cat's favourite sunny spot is rudely interrupted by his arch nemesis Jazz.

eps.name: It's a Dog's Life
eps.desc: A cat's curiosity has him encountering canines. The short title is based on Tofield's book "Simon's Cat: It's A Dog's Life".

eps.name: Bat Cat
eps.desc: Simon is scared of a moth and tries to get the cat to get rid of it. In the process, the Simon's flat is invaded by bats. (Halloween special episode.)
